instruction: Write a short paragraph discussing the impact of smartphone turnover on electronic waste.
output: Smartphone turnover has contributed significantly to the mounting problem of electronic waste. With people constantly seeking the latest model of their favorite brand, physical phones are more often than not trashed instead of being recycled. This has resulted in a staggering prediction that the world will generate 52.2 million tons of e-waste every year by 2021. The surge in e-waste is not only hazardous to the environment but also poses health risks to human beings. Companies need to step up and take responsibility for their products by implementing measures to salvage technology parts. Fujifilm's recycling techniques, developed to address for its specific product, is a great example to follow.
